caught up when I get back.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> "Predicons",the name made Lunarpine druel,"I know that name, and 
for some
> odd reason dislike it very much, must be what the last rabbit I 
caught felt
> like."
> The mysterious wolf looked upon the aquaintance before him,"I 
believe I may
> have a purpose after all.". He still couldn't shake the fealing 
that with or
> without his help this war would last a very long time.

> > ::Shadow Wing::
> > "I speak the truth.  The others I am speaking of are Maximals.  
They are

purpose
> of
> > good itself.  We defend others aginst the Predacons and a new 
threat, the
> > New Comers.  They both wish to use this planets resources and 
destroy all
> > the life on it for thier own will and care nothing for anyone but
> > themselves.  They kill for pleasure and nothing else." She sighed 
and
> looked
> > into his almost hypnotic eyes.
> > "This war is sensless and painful for all. But I'd be honored if 
you'd
> join
> > me and fight with me for what is right and just."
> > She smiled at him.  She kind of liked him a little.
> > "It's not easy doing the right thing. Could even get you yourself 
killed.
> > But, I know that it would be worth it to die doing what is 
right.  If you
> > decide not to join me, I will understand.  The right thing isn't 
always
> the
> > easiest thing to be doing."
